name: FPS Mini Jam #2 Entry
description:
Blast as many monsters as you can before you get too hurt! Good luck, and don't die!

How to Play: WASD to move, Right mouse to turn on the flashlight, Left mouse to shoot, collect Ammo packs to gain ammo, collect Rapid Fire packs to gain the Rapid Fire power-up!

-Highscoring system will be added soon-

Comment what you would like to see added, and I will see what I can do!
